Sql.query: insert into cpa_central_pmpo ( cpacnpcodi, cpacntcodi, cparcodi, ptomedicodi, cpacnpusumodificacion, cpacnpfecmodificacion ) values ( :cpacnpcodi, :cpacntcodi, :cparcodi, :ptomedicodi, :cpacnpusumodificacion, :cpacnpfecmodificacion )

update cpa_central_pmpo set cpacntcodi = :cpacntcodi, ptomedicodi = :ptomedicodi, cpacnpusumodificacion = :cpacnpusumodificacion, cpacnpfecmodificacion = :cpacnpfecmodificacion where cpacnpcodi = :cpacnpcodi
select * from cpa_central_pmpo where cpacntcodi = :cpacntcodi order by cpacnpcodi asc
select cpacnpcodi, cpacntcodi, ptomedicodi, cpacnpusumodificacion, cpacnpfecmodificacion from cpa_central_pmpo where cpacnpcodi = :cpacnpcodi

select cpacnpcodi, cpacntcodi, ptomedicodi, cpacnpusumodificacion, cpacnpfecmodificacion from cpa_central_pmpo where (-1 = {0} or cpacnpcodi = {0}) and (-1 = {1} or cpacntcodi = {1}) and (-1 = {2} or ptomedicodi = {2})

select tab1.cpacnpcodi, tab1.cpacntcodi, tab1.ptomedicodi, '[' || tab1.ptomedicodi || '] ' || trim(tab2.PTOMEDIDESC) || CASE WHEN tab2.ptomediestado = 'B' THEN ' [' || tab2.ptomediestado || ']' ELSE '' END AS ptomedidesc, tab1.cpacnpusumodificacion, tab1.cpacnpfecmodificacion from cpa_central_pmpo tab1 join me_ptomedicion tab2 on tab1.ptomedicodi = tab2.ptomedicodi where cpacntcodi = {0} order by cpacnpcodi asc
select cpacnpcodi, cpacntcodi, cparcodi, ptomedicodi, cpacnpusumodificacion, cpacnpfecmodificacion from cpa_central_pmpo where ('-1' = '{0}' or cpacntcodi in ({0}))
select cpacnpcodi, cpacntcodi, cparcodi, ptomedicodi, cpacnpusumodificacion, cpacnpfecmodificacion from cpa_central_pmpo where (-1 = {0} or cparcodi = {0})
